divs: Sighting DetailsI took out the trash and looked up in the eastern sky to see a red light go across the sky. I saw a plane flying alot lower in the southern sky. I looked east at watched as the red light stopped in mid-air at a white point. The red and white flashed or pulsated and it seemed like the white light went in and out of the red light. I got the Ipad to see what constellations were in the sky. The report said it was where Betelgeuse is. This would make sense except I know I saw the red light travel horizonatally across the sky and stop.
Summary: saw this light go across the sky and stop at a white point of light.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around January 22nd 2012
